<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Limited">[Radiant Field](/Spells.aspx?ID=1084)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 78</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You create an area of bright light. Creatures with [light blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22) that are [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) by radiant field and remain in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turns. On a failure, a creature remains blinded for 1 round; this is an [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) effect. This spell also suppresses magical [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) of your _radiant field_ spell's level or lower.

---
**Heightened (4th)** Creatures seen through the area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to creatures with light blindness, even those that are outside the area.
